title: ACCOUNTING
de_requirements:
(I)          At least two Passes at GCE Advanced Level, to include Economics and any one of Government, Geography, Mathematics, Business Method and Economic History.

(ii)         IJMB/JUPEB/NCE/ND/ATS of ICAN/NIM/NIMN/ANAN or approved equivalent.

(iii)        Holders of HND in Banking and Finance, Accounting, Business Administration and other related disciplines from a recognized Polytechnic.
utme_requirements: Five (5) O' Level Credits to include English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other two subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and any other Social Science subject

title: AGRICULTURAL EXTENSION & SOCIAL ENGINEERING
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes or equivalents in Chemistry and Biology/Agricultural Science/Botany/Zoology/Economics/Mathematics/Physics/Geography/Geology
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes  in English Language, Chemistry, Mathematics, Biology/Agricultural Science plus one of Physics, Geography and Economics.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology /Agriculture and Physics or Mathematics

title: AGRICULTURAL SCIENCE AND EDUCATION
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) passes at 'A' Level in Biology /Zoology /Botany and any other Science subject.

(ii) NCE merit in Biology and any other Science subject.

(iii) NCE merit in Agriculture (Double Major).
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes or equivalents in English Language, Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science., Mathematics and another relevant subject.
subjects: Any three (3) subjects from Chemistry, Biology, Agriculture, Physics, Economics, Geography and Mathematics.

title: AGRICULTURE
de_requirements:
(i)          NCE, OND or approved equivalents of at least upper credit in relevant fields.

(ii)         Two A-Level passes to include Chemistry and any one of the following: Biology/Botany, Zoology/Agricultural Science, Economics, Physics, and Geography.

(iii)        IJMB at acceptable grade levels.
utme_requirements: Five (5) five O' Level credits to include: English Language, Mathematics, Biology/Agricultural Science/Home Economics/ Fisheries, Chemistry and one of Physics, Geography, or Economics.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology/Agriculture, and Physics/Mathematics.

title: ANATOMY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Biology, Chemistry and Physics in addition to the UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) O' Level credits in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology.
subjects: English Language, Biology, Chemistry and Physics

title: ARCHITECTURE
de_requirements:
(i)       Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Mathematics or Physics and Chemistry, Geography or Fine Arts.

ND/HND upper credits in relevant field
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any of Fine Art, Geography or Wood Work, Biology, Economics, Technical Drawing, Further. Mathematics., Introduction to Building Construction, Bricklaying/Block laying, Concreting, Wall, Floors and Ceiling Finishing, Joinery, Carpentary, Decorative Painting, Lining, Sign and Design, Wall Hanging, Colour Mixing/Matching and Glazing, Ceramics, Graphics Design, Graphic Printing, Basic Electricity
subjects: Physics, Mathematics, and any of Chemistry, Geography, Art, Biology and Economics

title: BANKING & FINANCE
de_requirements:
(I)          At least two Passes at GCE Advanced Level, to include Economics and any one of Government, Geography, Mathematics, Business Method, and Economic History.

(ii)         IJMB/JUPEB/NCE/ND/ATS of ICAN/NIM/NIMN/ANAN or approved equivalent.

(iii)        Holders of HND in Banking and Finance, Accounting, Business Administration and other related disciplines from a recognized Polytechnic.
utme_requirements: Five (5) O' Level Credits to include English Language and Mathematics, one Social Science subject and any other two subjects.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, and two other social science subjects.

title: BIOCHEMISTRY
de_requirements:
Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics and Biology.

 

NCE/ND/HND in related programmes plus the UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics and Biology.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics or Mathematics.

title: BUSINESS ADMINISTRATION
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes chosen from Economics, Accounts, Business Management, Government, Geography or Statistics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics, plus any two (2) of Accounting, Business Methods, Commerce, Government, Geography, and Statistics.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and one (1) other subject.

title: BUSINESS ADMINISTRATION
de_requirements:
(i)            At least two passes at GCE Advanced Level to include Economics, Government, History and Geography .

(ii)           IJMB/JUPEB/NCE.
utme_requirements: Five (5) O' Level Credits to include English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other two subjects at not more than two (2) sittings
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Economics plus any other social science subject

title: BUSINESS EDUCATION
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes or NCE merit in two (2) relevant subjects.

(ii) NCE merit in Business Education Double Major.
utme_requirements: Five (5) TC II merit, 'O' Level or NTC/NBC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and two (2) other subjects in the Social Sciences or Arts. For NBC, the other subjects could be from any of the following: Commerce, Office Practice, Principles of Accounts, Secretarial Duties, Typewriting and Shorthand.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics plus one (1) of Literature in English, History, Government, Geography, Chemistry and Physics.

title: CHEMISTRY
de_requirements:
i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Chemistry and any one (1) of Physics, Mathematics or Biology.

 

(ii)   ND/NCE with good grades in relevant 'O' Level subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology.
subjects: Chemistry and two (2) of Physics, Biology and Mathematics.

title: COMMUNICATION ARTS
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes/NCE to include CRS/Religious Studies.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, CRS and three (3) other relevant subjects.
subjects: Two (2) Arts subjects including CRS and any other subject.

title: COMMUNICATION ARTS
de_requirements: Two ‘A’ Level passes or equivalent in Arts or Social Science subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes or equivalent including English  Language, Literature in English, Arts/ Music depending on the combination.
subjects: Any three (3) Arts or   Social Science subjects.

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE
de_requirements:
(i)          NCE/ND or approved equivalent with at least Merit and Lower Credit respectively in the relevant fields.

(ii)         IJMB, JUPEB, Cambridge Moderated School of Basic Studies, GCE Advanced Level or approved equivalents at acceptable grade levels in Mathematics and Physics
utme_requirements: Five (5) O' Level subjects to include English Language, Mathematics, Physics, and any two from Further Mathematics, Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry, Economics, Technical Drawing, Basic Electronics/Electronics, Computer Studies, and Data Processing.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Physics and one (1) of Biology, Chemistry, Agricultural Science, Economics and Geography.

title: CYBER SECURITY
de_requirements:
i)      Two (2) 'A' Level passes in science subjects including Mathematics

 

(ii)   NCE merit in Mathematics and one (1) other Science or Social Science subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Physics plus two (2) other Science subjects
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and one (1) of Biology, Chemistry, Agric Science, Economics and Geography

title: DOCTOR OF PHYSIOTHERAPY
de_requirements: A degree in relevant discipline not less than 2nd Class Lower Division can apply.
utme_requirements: Five (5) O' Level credits in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, and Biology.
subjects: English Language, Biology, Chemistry and Physics

title: ECONOMICS
de_requirements:
(i)          At least two GCE Advanced Level passes which must include Economics, and any other subject from Government, Geography, History, Sociology, Psychology, Mathematics, and Further Mathematics.

(ii)         IJMB/JUPEB/NCE/ND or its approved equivalent at an acceptable grade level.
utme_requirements: Five (5) O' Level credits to include English Language, Mathematics, Economics, one social science subject from Geography, Government, History, Civic Education, Sociology, Psychology, and any other subject.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Economics plus any other social science subject or any other subject.

title: EDUCATION & BIOLOGY
de_requirements: NCE/'A' Level passes in Biology and one (1) other Science subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Biology, Chemistry, Mathematics and one (1) other subject.
subjects: Biology and two (2) other subjects from Chemistry, Mathematics and Physics.

title: EDUCATION AND CHEMISTRY:
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level/NCE passes including Chemistry and one (1) other Science subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credits in Mathematics, Chemistry, English Language and two (2) of Physics, Biology and Agricultural Science.
subjects: Chemistry and two (2) other subjects chosen from Physics, Biology and Mathematics.

title: EDUCATION AND COMPUTER SCIENCE
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes including Physics or Chemistry.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes or its equivalents including Mathematics, English Language and three (3) other Science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and one of Biology, Chemistry and Geography.

title: EDUCATION AND ECONOMICS
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Economics and one (1) other relevant subject.

(ii) NCE merit/credit in Economics and one (1) other subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language, Economics and Mathematics.
subjects: Economics, Mathematics and one (1) other subject from Geography/Physics, History, Government and Literature in English.

title: EDUCATION AND ENGLISH LANGUAGE
de_requirements:
(i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant teaching subjects including Literature in English.

(ii)  NCE credit or merit in two(2)relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language and Literature in English plus three (3) other Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Literature in English and one (1) Art and any other subject.

title: EDUCATION AND MATHEMATICS
de_requirements: Two (2)'A' Level passes/NCE in Mathematics and one (1) Science subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics plus one (1) other Science subject.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of the following Science subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology.

title: EDUCATION AND MUSIC:
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes/NCE merit in Music.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including Music and English Language.
subjects: Music and any other two (2) Arts/Social Science subjects.

title: EDUCATION AND PHYSICS
de_requirements:
(i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Physics and Mathematics.

(ii) NCE credit/merit in relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credits passes to include English Language, Physics, Mathematics and two (2) other Science subjects or NTC/NBC.
subjects: Physics, Mathematics or Chemistry plus one (1) other subjects.

title: EDUCATION AND RELIGIOUS STUDIES
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes/NCE merit in Religious Studies and one (1) other Arts subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes or TC II merit in five (5) subjects including English Language, Religious Studies and three (3) other Arts subjects.
subjects: Two (2) Arts subject including Religious studies and one (1) other subject.

title: EDUCATIONAL MANAGEMENT
de_requirements: Same as in Educational Psychology, Guidance and Counseling.
utme_requirements: Same as in Educational Psychology, Guidance and Counseling.
subjects: Economics, Mathematics and one (1) other Social Science/Arts subject.

title: ELECTRICAL /ELECTRONICS ENGINEERING
de_requirements:
(i)          National Diploma (ND) with upper credit pass in the relevant field of study for admission into 200 level or Higher National Diploma (HND) in the relevant field for admission into 300 level

 

(ii)         GCE ‘A’ Level Passes in Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry in addition to ‘O’ level requirements.

(iii)        Candidates with JUPEB or IJMB at acceptable grade levels.
utme_requirements: Five (5) O' Level credits to include English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, and any other Science subject.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

title: ENGLISH LANGUAGE
de_requirements:
(i)            At least two Advanced Level Passes or equivalent in Literature and other Arts subject.

(ii)           IJMB/JUPEB at acceptable grade levels.
utme_requirements: Five (5) O`Level credits to include English Language, Literature- in-English plus at least one other Arts subject.
subjects: English Language, Literature- in- English and any two Arts subjects.

title: FISHERIES AND AQUACULTURE:
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in any of Chemistry, Biology, Botany, Zoology, Agricultural Science Geography, Mathematics (pure & applied), Physics, Geology and Economics.

 

(ii)NCE Agriculture
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry, Mathematics and English Language plus any other Science subject.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science and any other Science subject.

title: FOOD SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGY
de_requirements:
(i)            NCE, OND, or approved equivalents in relevant fields at the upper credit level.

(II)           Food Technology, Agriculture, Biology, Chemistry, Science Laboratory Technology,  Physics,    Mathematics, any of the sciences with the requisite ‘O’ Level requirement.

(iii)          Two Advanced Level subjects.

    (a)        Physics and Chemistry or Biology/Agriculture

    (b)        Mathematics/Statistics and Chemistry or                  Biology/Agriculture

(iv)        IJMB at acceptable grade levels.

(v)         In addition to the two Advanced Level papers to be specified by the University, candidates must have credits in three ordinary level subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) O" Level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and any other three from Physics, Chemistry, Biology/Agriculture/Geography and any other science-based subjects.
subjects: English Language, Chemistry, Biology and Mathematics/Physics.

title: FORESTRY AND ENVIRONMENTAL MGT.
de_requirements: Two (2) ’A’ Level passes in Chemistry and Biology or Agric Science or Zoology or Botany.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English, Chemistry, Mathematics, Biology and one of Physics, Economics, Further Mathematics and Statistics.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology/Agriculture and Physics or Mathematics

title: HISTORY & INTERNATIONAL STUDIES
de_requirements:

(iii)          NCE, ND or approved equivalents with at least Upper Credit in relevant fields.

subjects: English Language, History or Government and Economics and any other subjects from Arts and Social Sciences.

(ii)         IJMB/JUPEB/NCE/ND or approved equivalents.

(iii)        Holders of HND from a recognized Polytechnic with a minimum of lower credit in Chemistry, Applied Chemistry or Industrial Chemistry and Laboratory Technology can be admitted to 300 Level.
utme_requirements: Five (5) ‘O' Level subjects to include English Language, Chemistry, Physics, Mathematics, and Biology.
subjects: English Language, Chemistry and any other two of Physics, Mathematics, and Biology.

i)      Two (2) 'A' Level passes in science subjects including Mathematics

title: LAW

(iii)        HND holders with Upper Credit in Mass Communication or related courses.

subjects: English Language, Literature-in-English and any two (2) others from Government/History, CRS/IRS, Economics, Geography, Commerce.

title: MATHEMATICS

(i)          At least two GCE Advanced Level passes to include Mathematics and any one of Biology, Chemistry, Economics, Statistics, and Physics.

title: MECHATRONICS ENGINEERING
de_requirements:

,

(ii)         GCE ‘A’ Level   Passes in Mathematics, Physics, and Chemistry in addition to ‘O’ level requirements.

(iii)        Candidates with JUPEB or IJMB at acceptable grade levels.

title: MEDICAL LABORATORY SCIENCE
de_requirements:
(i) Minimum of three Advanced Level GCE/Cambridge/IJMB/JUPEB at Grade C pass in each of Biology, Chemistry, and Physics.

(ii) B.Sc. degree in relevant disciplines such as Biology, Zoology/Animal Science, Plant Science/Botany/Plant Biology, Microbiology, Anatomy, Physiology, Biochemistry, Chemistry, Physics, etc; as approved by Senate.

(iii) HND in relevant fields as approved by Senate.

(iv) Candidates must have completed the compulsory one-year National Youth Service (NYSC) or must have been issued an exemption/exclusion certificate
utme_requirements: Five (5) O' Level credits in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, and Biology at not more than two sittings.
subjects: English Language, Biology, Chemistry and Physics

title: MEDICINE & SURGERY

(i)          Advanced Level GCE/Cambridge/IJMB/JUPEB at an acceptable grade level in three (3) subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology/Zoology for MB;BS programme.

(ii)         Candidates with B. Sc. Second Class Upper Division in a related discipline can apply for the MB;BS programme.
utme_requirements: Five (5) O' Level credits in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, and Biology.
subjects: English Language, Biology, Chemistry and Physics

title: SURVEYING & GEOINFORMATICS
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Mathematics or Physics and Chemistry, Geography or Fine Arts.

(ii) ND/HND upper credits in relevant field.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any of Fine Art, Geography or Wood Work, Biology, Economics, Technical Drawing, Further. Mathematics., Introduction to Building Construction, Bricklaying/Block laying, Concreting, Wall, Floors and Ceiling Finishing, Joinery, Carpentary, Decorative Painting, Lining, Sign and Design, Wall Hanging, Colour Mixing/Matching and Glazing, Ceramics, Graphics Design, Graphic Printing, Basic Electricity
subjects: Physics, Mathematics, and any of Chemistry, Geography, Art, Biology and Economics.

title: THEATRE ARTS
de_requirements:
(i)         At least two Advanced Level passes in Literature and one other Arts subject.

 (ii)          IJMB/JUPEB at acceptable grade levels.

(iii)          Diploma in Theatre Arts/Dramatic Arts from an accredited institution.
utme_requirements: Five (5) O` Level credits to include English Language, Literature-in-English and three other Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: English Language, Literature- in- English and any two Arts subjects.

title: ZOOLOGY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes or NCE in Biology, Zoology or Botany and one other Science subject
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology and two (2) other Science subject.
subjects: Biology and any two (2) of Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics.
